name: LoA
description:
"This creed of the desert seemed inexpressible in words, and indeed in thought." --T.E. Lawrence

--

CONTROLS:

WASD - movement

Space - jump

E - pick up items (some items may require some odd positioning to pick up)

1 - inventory

--

Note: Chrome no longer supports the Unity web player. If you are using Chrome, you will need to switch to another browser to play this game.

--

LoA is a tiny unity game I made a long time ago. I recently rediscovered it hiding on my hard drive. It was made very quickly and isn't perfect, but it's home to a pretty big desert. Although it may seem aimless, there is a narrative that will reveal itself over time.

LoA takes inspiration from the writings of T.E. Lawrence, and the film Lawrence of Arabia, which is based on his life.

--

Note: This is technically a prototype, as I do plan to expand on this game in the future. However, I am marking LoA as released for now as the full game will probably look very different.

Version 1.0: prototype complete. aware of a bug that requires odd character placement to pick up some objects. download coming soon.
